author: cnbc.com
title: Energous reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) _ Energous Corp. (WATT) on Thursday reported a loss of $11.2 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Jose, California-based company said it had a loss of 50 cents.
The maker of wire-free charging technology posted revenue of $29,100 in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $29,000.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $49.4 million, or $2.31 per share. Revenue was reported as $1.2 million.
Energous shares have increased 3 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $20.04, a rise of 19 percent in the last 12 months.
